# Load the weekly Data

```{r , include=FALSE}
#install.packages("nberwp")

library(nberwp)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Load the different tables

```{r}
authors <- nberwp::authors
paper.authors <- nberwp::paper_authors
paper.programs <- nberwp::paper_programs
papers <- nberwp::papers
programs <- nberwp::programs
```

```{r}
papers

```


# Plot authors

```{r}
e <- programs %>%
  inner_join(paper.programs) %>% 
  inner_join(papers) %>% 
  inner_join(paper.authors) %>% 
  inner_join(authors)
```
# Curious about James Heckman's papers

```{r}
test <- paper.authors %>% 
  filter(author == 'w0034.1') %>% 
  inner_join(papers) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  tally() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) 

test %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year,n)) +
    geom_col()
```
